headline: Change Foods partners with v2food to bring precision fermentation cheese to Australia.
summary: Change Foods partners with v2food to launch animal-free cheese, targeting Australian consumers.

headline: Modern Synthesis raises $4.1M to scale microbial textile platform.
summary: Modern Synthesis secured $4.1M to expand its production of microbial cellulose-based textiles.

headline: Solar Foods factory in Finland will produce Solein protein commercially.
summary: Solar Foods' factory starts commercial Solein production, using gas-fermentation for a sustainable protein source.

headline: Bolt Threads partners with Adidas for Mylo mushroom leather apparel.
summary: Adidas partners with Bolt Threads to create apparel using Mylo, a mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Perfect Day expands precision fermentation dairy production capacity.
summary: Perfect Day invests in expanding its precision fermentation capabilities for producing animal-free dairy proteins.

headline: Algiknit secures funding to scale seaweed-based yarn production.
summary: Algiknit receives funding to scale production of its yarn made from sustainably harvested seaweed.

headline: Remilk announces new production facility for animal-free dairy in Europe.
summary: Remilk establishes a new production plant in Europe to scale up its animal-free dairy production.

headline: Geltor launches vegan collagen for beauty and materials applications.
summary: Geltor commercializes vegan collagen made via precision fermentation, targeting various material applications.

headline: Air Protein scales up production of air-based protein for food applications.
summary: Air Protein is expanding its production capabilities for protein made using air and renewable energy via gas fermentation.

headline: MycoWorks announces new Reishi mushroom leather products with luxury brand.
summary: MycoWorks partners with a luxury brand to launch new products using its Reishi mushroom leather alternative.
